mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOURS ORDER BY TOUR_DATE

SELECT * FROM TOURS T INNER JOIN THEME M ON T.THEME_NO = M.THEME_NO LEFT JOIN IMG TI ON T.TOUR_NO = TI.TOUR_NO AND THUMBNAIL = 'Y' INNER JOIN GUIDES G ON T.GUIDE_NO = G.GUIDE_NO INNER JOIN USERS U ON G.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GUIDE_IMG GI ON G.GUIDE_NO = GI.P_GUIDE_NO WHERE T.TOUR_NO = #{tourNo}
